CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 53 In order to evaluate the hole mobility of the resulting polymers , corresponding hole - only devices with configuration o f I T O / p o l y ( 3 , 4 -e t h y l e n e d i o x y t h i o p h e n e ) : p o l y -(styrenesulfonate) ( PEDOT : PSS ) / polymer / MoO 3 / Al were fabricated and the hole mobilities were obtained by using the space charge limited current ( SCLC ) model.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. p-type poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene):polystyrenesulfonate (PEDOT:PSS)
3. MoO3: Molybdenum Trioxide
4. Al: Aluminum.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are Indium Tin Oxide (ITO), p-type poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene):polystyrenesulfonate (PEDOT:PSS), Molybdenum Trioxide (MoO3), and Aluminum (Al).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. p-type poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene):polystyrenesulfonate (PEDOT:PSS)
2. MoO3
3. Al

So, the paragraph mentions the use of PEDOT:PSS, MoO3, and Al as materials in the fabrication of hole-only devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| p-type poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene):polystyrenesulfonate (PEDOT:PSS) |
| MoO3 |
| Al |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 53 In order to evaluate the hole mobility of the resulting polymers , corresponding hole - only devices with configuration o f I T O / p o l y ( 3 , 4 -e t h y l e n e d i o x y t h i o p h e n e ) : p o l y -(styrenesulfonate) ( PEDOT : PSS ) / polymer / MoO 3 / Al were fabricated and the hole mobilities were obtained by using the space charge limited current ( SCLC ) model.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. p-type semiconductor: Poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT:PSS)
3. polymer: Poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT:PSS)
4. MoO3: Molybdenum Trioxide
5. Al: Aluminum.

So, the Property Names in the paragraph are: ITO (Indium Tin Oxide) - type of conductive material, PEDOT:PSS (Poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate)) - type of polymer, MoO3 (Molybdenum Trioxide) - type of material, and Al (Aluminum) - type of material.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

The relevant Property Names in the paragraph that clearly refer to Materials and their Properties are:

1. PEDOT:PSS (Poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate)) - hole mobility.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| hole mobility of PEDOT:PSS |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 53 In order to evaluate the hole mobility of the resulting polymers , corresponding hole - only devices with configuration o f I T O / p o l y ( 3 , 4 -e t h y l e n e d i o x y t h i o p h e n e ) : p o l y -(styrenesulfonate) ( PEDOT : PSS ) / polymer / MoO 3 / Al were fabricated and the hole mobilities were obtained by using the space charge limited current ( SCLC ) model.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide - a type of conductive material used as an electrode in electronic devices.
2. p-type silicon (3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene:polystyrenesulfonate) (PEDOT:PSS): A type of conducting polymer used as a hole transporting material in organic electronics.
3. MoO3: Molybdenum trioxide - a type of inorganic semiconductor material used as a hole transporting layer in electronic devices.
4. Al: Aluminum - a type of metal used as an electrode in electronic devices.

So, the property values in the paragraph are:
- ITO: Indium Tin Oxide - hole mobility not specified
- PEDOT:PSS: p-type silicon (3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene:polystyrenesulfonate) - hole mobility obtained using SCLC model
- MoO3: Molybdenum trioxide - hole mobility not specified
- Al: Aluminum - not a property value, but a material used in the device.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

The relevant entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to the value of material properties are:

1. PEDOT:PSS: p-type silicon (3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene:polystyrenesulfonate) - hole mobility: obtained using SCLC model.

All other entities mentioned in the paragraph are not property values but rather materials or methods used in the fabrication of the devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| hole mobility of PEDOT:PSS |

Note: The property value is "hole mobility of PEDOT:PSS" as obtained using the space charge limited current (SCLC) model, as stated in the paragraph.
